thread.section_title: Hotel Artemide - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect hotel
thread.title_full: Perfect hotel - Review of Hotel Artemide, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Fred S
title: Perfect hotel
text: My wife and I spent a fabulous week at this wonderful hotel. The location is about a 20 minute walk from several major attractions and a 15 minute metro ride from the Vatican. The metro station is a five minute walk from the hotel. We desired a quiet room and we could not hear any noise from the street. The breakfast buffet was high quality with a large selection and excellent coffee. Everyone was pleasant and helpful. Our delux room was clean, modern, with a large bathroom. Upon return to Rome we would definitely return to Hotel Artemide.
